text: Cain XVIII () is a 1963 Soviet comedy movie directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova and Mikhail Shapiro.К 100-летию театрального режиссера Юрия Любимова вспомнят его актерские работыКАИН ВОСЕМНАДЦАТЫЙ It stars Erast Garin, Lidiya Sukharevskaya, and Mikhail Zharov. ==Actors== * Erast Garin as King Cain XVIII * Lidiya Sukharevskaya as Queen Vlasta * Mikhail Zharov as Minister of War * Yuri Lyubimov as First Minister * Alexander Demyanenko as Ian * Stanislav Khitrov as Jean == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian fantasy movies Category:1963 comedy movies Category:1963 fantasy movies Category:Movies based on fairy tales Category:Movies directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Shapiro
title: Cain XVIII
